00021 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 static uint8        const sMonthDays[ 12 ] = { 31, 28, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31 };
00025 
00026 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 static uint32       const sYearDays[ 12 ]  = { 0, 31, 59, 90, 120, 151, 181, 212, 243, 273, 304, 334 };
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 void UTIL_convert_seconds_to_date_type
00038     (
00039     const time_type     * aSeconds,
00040     date_time_data_type * aDateTime
00041     )
00042 {
00043     /*----------------------------------------------------------
00044     Local Variables
00045     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00046     boolean         isLeapYear;
00047     time_type       days;
00048     sint32          fourYearCount;
00049 
00050     days            = *aSeconds / SECONDS_PER_DAY;
00051     fourYearCount   = (sint32)( days / DAYS_IN_4_YEARS );
00052     days           -= fourYearCount * DAYS_IN_4_YEARS;
00053     aDateTime->date.year      = (uint16)( fourYearCount * 4 ) + BASE_YEAR;
00054 
00055     while( days > DAYS_IN_1_YEAR )
00056     {
00057         days -= DAYS_IN_1_YEAR;
00058 
00059         if( ( aDateTime->date.year % 4 ) == 0 )
00060         {
00061             days--;
00062         }
00063 
00064         ( aDateTime->date.year )++;
00065     }
00066 
00067     if( days < 1 )
00068     {
00069         aDateTime->date.year--;
00070         aDateTime->date.month = DECEMBER;
00071         aDateTime->date.day   = sMonthDays[ DECEMBER - 1 ];
00072     }
00073     else
00074     {
00075         isLeapYear = FALSE;
00076 
00077         /*--------------------------------------------------
00078         Adjust for the extra day that happens during leap
00079         years (February 29).  This adjustment needs to
00080         happen any time after the beginning of March.
00081         --------------------------------------------------*/
00082         if( ( days > sYearDays[ MARCH - 1 ] ) &&
00083             ( ( aDateTime->date.year % 4 )  == 0 ) )
00084         {
00085             days--;
00086             isLeapYear = TRUE;
00087         }
00088 
00089         for( aDateTime->date.month = DECEMBER;
00090             days <= sYearDays[ aDateTime->date.month -1 ];
00091             aDateTime->date.month-- );
00092 
00093         aDateTime->date.day = (uint8)( days - sYearDays[ aDateTime->date.month - 1 ] );
00094 
00095         if( ( isLeapYear     == TRUE                          ) &&
00096             ( aDateTime->date.month   == FEBRUARY                      ) &&
00097             ( aDateTime->date.day     == sMonthDays[ FEBRUARY - 1 ] ) )
00098         {
00099             aDateTime->date.day++;
00100         }
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00104 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 boolean UTIL_convert_date_time_to_seconds
00113     (
00114     const date_time_data_type * aDateTime,
00115     time_type * aSeconds
00116     )
00117 {
00118     /*----------------------------------------------------------
00119     Local Variables
00120     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00121     time_type       days;
00122     sint32          fourYearCount;
00123     int             i;
00124 
00125     returnif_v( ( aDateTime->date.year  <  1989 ),        FALSE );
00126     returnif_v( ( aDateTime->date.year  == 1989 ) &&
00127         ( aDateTime->date.month <  12 ),          FALSE );
00128     returnif_v( ( aDateTime->date.year  == 1989 ) &&
00129         ( aDateTime->date.month == 12 ) &&
00130         ( aDateTime->date.day < 31 ),             FALSE );
00131 
00132     returnif_v( ( aDateTime->date.year >  2126 ),         FALSE );
00133     returnif_v( ( aDateTime->date.year == 2126 ) &&
00134         ( aDateTime->date.month >  2 ),           FALSE );
00135     returnif_v( ( aDateTime->date.year == 2126 ) &&
00136         ( aDateTime->date.month == 2 ) &&
00137         ( aDateTime->date.day > 5 ),              FALSE );
00138 
00139     returnif_v( ( aDateTime->date.month == 0 ) ||
00140         ( aDateTime->date.month > 12 ),           FALSE );
00141 
00142     fourYearCount = ( aDateTime->date.year - BASE_YEAR ) / 4;
00143     days          = (sint32)fourYearCount * DAYS_IN_4_YEARS;
00144 
00145     for( i = ( ( fourYearCount * 4 ) + BASE_YEAR ); i < (int)aDateTime->date.year; i++ )
00146     {
00147         days += DAYS_IN_1_YEAR;
00148         if( (i % 4) == 0 )
00149         {
00150             days++;
00151         }
00152     }
00153 
00154     days += sYearDays[ aDateTime->date.month - 1 ];
00155     if( ( aDateTime->date.month      >  FEBRUARY ) &&
00156         ( ( aDateTime->date.year % 4 ) == 0        ) )
00157     {
00158         days++;
00159     }
00160 
00161     days += aDateTime->date.day;
00162 
00163     /*------------------------------------------------------
00164     This accounts for the fact that internal time really
00165     starts one day before the base year.  The above
00166     conversion does not work for December 31, 1989.
00167     ------------------------------------------------------*/
00168     if( ( aDateTime->date.year  == 1989 ) &&
00169         ( aDateTime->date.month == 12   ) &&
00170         ( aDateTime->date.day   == 31   ) )
00171     {
00172         days = 0;
00173     }
00174 
00175     *aSeconds = days * SECONDS_PER_DAY;
00176     return TRUE;
00177 }

00186     (
00187     double      aDegrees
00188     )
00189 {
00190 return aDegrees * (double)( PI / 180 );

00201 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00202 sint32 UTIL_convert_degrees_to_semicircles
00203     (
00204     double      aDegrees
00205     )
00206 {
00207 return (sint32)( aDegrees * (double)( ( 1 << 30 ) / 90 ) );
00208 }   /* UTIL_convert_degrees_to_semicircles() */

00210 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00215 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00216 void UTIL_convert_seconds_to_gps_time
00217     (
00218     const time_type * aSeconds,
00219     gps_time_type * aGpsTime
00220     )
00221 {
00222     aGpsTime->week_number_days = (sint32)( *aSeconds / SECONDS_PER_DAY );
00223     aGpsTime->time_of_week     = *aSeconds - ( aGpsTime->week_number_days * SECONDS_PER_DAY );
00224 }
00225 
00226 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00230 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00231 void UTIL_convert_gps_time_to_seconds
00232     (
00233     const gps_time_type * aGpsTime,
00234     time_type * aSeconds
00235     )
00236 {
00237     *aSeconds = ( aGpsTime->week_number_days * SECONDS_PER_DAY ) + aGpsTime->time_of_week;
00238 }

00258 double UTIL_convert_semicircles_to_degrees
00259     (
00260     sint32      aSemicircles
00261     )

00266 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00272 void UTIL_convert_seconds_to_time_type
00273     (
00274     const time_type * aSeconds,
00275     date_time_data_type * aDateTime
00276     )
00277 {
00278     time_type       secondsSinceMidnight;
00279 
00280     secondsSinceMidnight = *aSeconds % SECONDS_PER_DAY;
00281 
00282     aDateTime->time.hour   = (sint16)( secondsSinceMidnight / SECONDS_PER_HOUR );
00283     secondsSinceMidnight             -= aDateTime->time.hour * SECONDS_PER_HOUR;
00284     aDateTime->time.minute = (uint8)( secondsSinceMidnight / SECONDS_PER_MINUTE );
00285     aDateTime->time.second = (uint8)( secondsSinceMidnight - aDateTime->time.minute * SECONDS_PER_MINUTE );
00286 }
00287 
00288 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00292 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00293 void UTIL_convert_time_type_to_seconds
00294     (
00295     const date_time_data_type * aDateTime,
00296     time_type                 * aSeconds
00297     )
00298 {
00299     *aSeconds = ( aDateTime->time.hour   * SECONDS_PER_HOUR )
00300               + ( aDateTime->time.minute * SECONDS_PER_MINUTE )
00301               +   aDateTime->time.second;
00302 }

00305 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00320 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00321 uint16 UTIL_hex_to_uint8
00322     (
00323     const char *  aHexString,
00324     uint8      *  aBinaryData,
00325     uint16        aMaxBytes
00326     )
00327 {
00328     static const char hex[] = "0123456789abcdef";
00329     const char * currentChar;
00330     const char * hexPos;
00331     bool         highNibble = true;
00332     uint16       binaryIndex = 0;
00333     uint8        workByte = 0;
00334 
00335     currentChar = aHexString;
00336 
00337     while( binaryIndex < aMaxBytes && *currentChar != '\0' )
00338     {
00339         hexPos = strchr( hex, tolower( *currentChar ) );
00340         if( hexPos != NULL )
00341         {
00342             if( highNibble )
00343             {
00344                 workByte = (uint8)( ( hexPos - hex ) << 4 );
00345             }
00346             else
00347             {
00348                 workByte += (uint8)( hexPos - hex );
00349                 aBinaryData[binaryIndex++] = workByte;
00350             }
00351             highNibble = !highNibble;
00352         }
00353         else return 0;
00354         currentChar++;
00355     }
00356     if( !highNibble )
00357         binaryIndex = 0;
00358 
00359     return binaryIndex;
00360 }
00361 
00362 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00373 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00374 void UTIL_uint8_to_hex
00375     (
00376     const uint8         * aData,
00377     char                * aOutput,
00378     uint8                 aNumBytes
00379     )
00380 {
00381     static const char hex[] = "0123456789abcdef";
00382 
00383     for( int i = 0; i < aNumBytes; i++ )
00384     {
00385         aOutput[2 * i]   = hex[ aData[i] / 16 ];
00386         aOutput[2 * i + 1] = hex[ aData[i] % 16 ];
00387     }
00388     aOutput[2 * aNumBytes] = '\0';
00389 }
00390 
00391 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00408 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00409 uint8 UTIL_hex_to_uint16
00410     (
00411     const char * aHexString,
00412     uint16     * aBinaryData,
00413     uint8        aMaxWords
00414     )
00415 {
00416     static const char hex[] = "0123456789abcdef";
00417     const char * currentChar;
00418     const char * hexPos;
00419     int          state = 0;
00420     uint8        binaryIndex = 0;
00421     uint16       work = 0;
00422 
00423     currentChar = aHexString;
00424 
00425     while( binaryIndex < aMaxWords && *currentChar != '\0' )
00426     {
00427         hexPos = strchr( hex, tolower( *currentChar ) );
00428         if( hexPos != NULL )
00429         {
00430             switch( state )
00431                 {
00432                 case 0: //highest byte
00433                     work = (uint16)( hexPos - hex ) << 12;
00434                     break;
00435                 case 1: //middle high
00436                     work += (uint16)( hexPos - hex ) << 8;
00437                     break;
00438                 case 2: //middle low
00439                     work += (uint16)( hexPos - hex ) << 4;
00440                     break;
00441                 case 3: //lowest
00442                     work += (uint16)( hexPos - hex );
00443                     aBinaryData[binaryIndex++] = work;
00444                 }
00445             state++;
00446             if( state > 3 ) state = 0;
00447         }
00448         else return 0;
00449         currentChar++;
00450     }
00451 
00452     if( state != 0 )
00453     {
00454         binaryIndex = 0;
00455     }
00456 
00457     return binaryIndex;
00458 }

00461 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00468 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00469 bool UTIL_data_is_printable
00470     (
00471     const char * aData,
00472     int          aLength
00473     )
00474 {
00475     for( int i = 0; i < aLength; i++ )
00476     {
00477         if( aData[i] < 0 || !isprint( aData[i] ) )
00478         {
00479             return false;
00480         }
00481     }
00482     return true;
00483 }
00484 
00485 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00492 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00493 bool UTIL_data_is_uint32
00494     (
00495     const char * aData
00496     )
00497 {
00498     if( strlen( aData ) == 0 )
00499     {
00500         return false;
00501     }
00502 
00503     if( _atoi64( aData ) > max_uint_val( uint32 ) ||
00504         _atoi64( aData ) < 0                      )
00505     {
00506         return false;
00507     }
00508 
00509     for( unsigned int i = 0; i < strlen( aData ); i++ )
00510     {
00511         if( aData[i] < '0' || aData[i] > '9' )
00512         {
00513             return false;
00514         }
00515     }
00516     return true;
00517 }

00519 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00523 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00524 void UTIL_convert_UTC_to_local
00525     (
00526     const time_type * aUtcTime,
00527     time_type       * aLocalTime
00528     )
00529 {
00530     TIME_ZONE_INFORMATION tzinfo;
00531 
00532     switch ( GetTimeZoneInformation( &tzinfo ) )
00533     {
00534     case TIME_ZONE_ID_DAYLIGHT:
00535         *aLocalTime = *aUtcTime - ( ( tzinfo.Bias + tzinfo.DaylightBias ) * SECONDS_PER_MINUTE );
00536         break;
00537     default:
00538         *aLocalTime = *aUtcTime - ( ( tzinfo.Bias + tzinfo.StandardBias ) * SECONDS_PER_MINUTE );
00539     }
00540 }

00542 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00549 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00550 void UTIL_format_time_string
00551     (
00552     const date_time_data_type * aDateTime,
00553     char                      * aResultString
00554     )
00555 {
00556     boolean morning = TRUE;
00557     sint16  hour = aDateTime->time.hour;
00558 
00559     // 0 <= hour <= 23
00560     if( hour >= 12 )
00561     {
00562         hour -= 12;
00563         morning = FALSE;
00564     }
00565     // 0 <= hour <= 11
00566     if( hour == 0 ) hour = 12;
00567 
00568     if( morning )
00569         sprintf( aResultString, "%02d:%02d:%02d AM", hour, aDateTime->time.minute, aDateTime->time.second );
00570     else
00571         sprintf( aResultString, "%02d:%02d:%02d PM", hour, aDateTime->time.minute, aDateTime->time.second );
00572 }
00573 
00574 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00577 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00578 time_type UTIL_get_current_garmin_time()
00579 {
00580     time_t   aCurrentTime;
00581     tm     * aCurrentTm;
00582 
00583     time( &aCurrentTime );
00584     //convert to nice struct that separates into years since 1900, days, hours, minutes...
00585     aCurrentTm = gmtime( &aCurrentTime );
00586 
00587     //Garmin time counts seconds from Dec 31, 1989
00588     //First, find seconds from Jan 1 1990 to aCurrentTm, excluding leap days
00589     time_type seconds = ( ( aCurrentTm->tm_year - 90 ) * SECONDS_PER_DAY * DAYS_IN_1_YEAR )
00590                       + ( aCurrentTm->tm_yday          * SECONDS_PER_DAY    )
00591                       + ( aCurrentTm->tm_hour          * SECONDS_PER_HOUR   )
00592                       + ( aCurrentTm->tm_min           * SECONDS_PER_MINUTE )
00593                       + ( aCurrentTm->tm_sec                                );
00594 
00595     // Then add seconds from Dec 31 1989 to Jan 1 1990
00596     seconds += SECONDS_PER_DAY;
00597 
00598     //adjust for leap days
00599     // 88 last leap year prior to base year
00600     // (subtract 88 since time_t base year is 1900)
00601     int leapDays = ( aCurrentTm->tm_year - 88 ) / 4;
00602 
00603     // if in a leap year and on or before Feb 28
00604     //   -> leap day has not happened this year
00605     if( ( aCurrentTm->tm_year % 4 == 0 ) &&
00606         ( aCurrentTm->tm_yday <= sYearDays[2] ) )
00607     {
00608         leapDays--;
00609     }
00610     seconds += leapDays * SECONDS_PER_DAY;
00611     return seconds;
00612 }

00622 void UTIL_format_date_string
00623     (
00624     const date_time_data_type * aDateTime,
00625     char                      * aResultString
00626     )
00627 {
00628     sprintf( aResultString, "%02d/%02d/%04d", aDateTime->date.month, aDateTime->date.day, aDateTime->date.year );

00631 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00637 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00638 double UTIL_calc_2d_speed
00639     (
00640     float32 aNorthVelocity,
00641     float32 aEastVelocity
00642     )
00643 {
00644     return sqrt( pow( (double)aNorthVelocity, 2.0 ) +
00645                  pow( (double)aEastVelocity,  2.0 ) );
00646 }

00648 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00655 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00656 void UTIL_calc_2d_direction
00657     (
00658     float32   aNorthVelocity,
00659     float32   aEastVelocity,
00660     char    * aCardinalDirection
00661     )
00662 {
00663     if( ( aNorthVelocity == 0 ) && ( aEastVelocity == 0 ) )
00664     {
00665         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "" );
00666         return;
00667     }
00668 
00669     double angle = atan2( (double)aNorthVelocity, (double)aEastVelocity );
00670 
00671     //between -pi/8 and pi/8 = E
00672     if( angle > ( PI * -1/8 ) && angle < ( PI * 1/8 ) )
00673         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "E" );
00674     //between pi/8 and 3pi/8 = NE
00675     else if( angle >= ( PI * 1/8 ) && angle < ( PI * 3/8 ) )
00676         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "NE" );
00677     //between 3pi/8 and 5pi/8 = N
00678     else if( angle >= ( PI * 3/8 ) && angle < ( PI * 5/8 ) )
00679         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "N" );
00680     //between 5pi/8 and 7pi/8 = NW
00681     else if( angle >= ( PI * 5/8 ) && angle < ( PI * 7/8 ) )
00682         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "NW" );
00683     //greater than 7pi/8 OR less than -7pi/8 = W
00684     else if( angle >= ( PI * 7/8 ) || angle < ( PI * -7/8 ) )
00685         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "W" );
00686     //between -7*pi/8 and -5pi/8 = SW
00687     else if( angle >= ( PI * -7/8 ) && angle < ( PI * -5/8 ) )
00688         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "SW" );
00689     //between -5pi/8 and -3pi/8 = S
00690     else if( angle >= ( PI * -5/8 ) && angle < ( PI * -3/8 ) )
00691         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "S" );
00692     //between -3pi/8 and -pi/8 = SE
00693     else if( angle >= ( PI * -3/8 ) && angle < ( PI * -1/8 ) )
00694         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "SE" );
00695     else
00696         strcpy( aCardinalDirection, "??" );
00697 }
